import colors from"assets/theme/base/colors";import borders from"assets/theme/base/borders";import boxShadows from"assets/theme/base/boxShadows";// Material Dashboard 2 PRO React helper functions
import pxToRem from"assets/theme/functions/pxToRem";import linearGradient from"assets/theme/functions/linearGradient";const{transparent,gradients}=colors;const{borderRadius}=borders;const{colored}=boxShadows;const stepper={styleOverrides:{root:{background:linearGradient(gradients.info.main,gradients.info.state),padding:`${pxToRem(24)} 0 ${pxToRem(16)}`,borderRadius:borderRadius.lg,boxShadow:colored.info,"&.MuiPaper-root":{backgroundColor:transparent.main}}}};export default stepper;
